1 pound beef top round or top sirloin,1/4 cup cornstarch,1 ( 14-ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice,,1/2 cup beef broth,1/2 cup soy sauce,2 tablespoons rice vinegar,2 tablespoons sambal oelek,2 tablespoons vegetable oil,1 cup red onion,1 cup carrots,7 ounces snow peas,1/2 large red bell pepper,2 cloves garlic, minced,2 tablespoons ginger,chives for garnish,hot cooked rice,,
